name: Basic Bard Spellcasting
summary: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits for bard spellcasting.
description:
You gain the basic spellcasting benefits. Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from the bard archetype, add a common occult spell or another spell you learned or discovered to your repertoire, of the appropriate spell level.Basic Bard Spellcasting Leads To...

Expert Bard Spellcasting, Occult BreadthTraitsArchetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
